name: Somewhat of an FPS
description:
Some What of an FPS is a game inspired by Karlson

Jump wall run and dash to the end in this super hard parkour game

Grappling gun code by dani

WASD to move 

MOUSE  to Look around

PRESS W FAST TWICE TO DASH!

You can only wall run on the metal walls and grapple on the boxes

MOUSE CLICK ON METAL BOXES TO GRAPLE

W+ A OR D KEY (DEPENDS ON WHICH DIRECTION) ON METAL WALL TO WALL RUN

Trailer coming soon

A GAME BY SANDER

ENJOY!!!

Leave any questions in the comments and I will try to answer

TO TURN DOWN THE SOUND:

https://www.addictivetips.com/windows-tips/permanently-mute-an-app-on-windows-10/#:~:text=Click%20the%20speaker%20icon%20under,the%20volume%20is%20still%20muted.

USE THAT GUIDE!!!!!
